sections.heading: (a) All mass transit employees shall be required to participate
sections.text:

sections.heading: All carriers shall submit their proposed program to the Review
sections.text:
Committee at least 4 months prior to the implementation date and shall include
in such report the name of the institution or organization providing the
training, the cost of the program, the proposed curriculum, the number of
transit employees involved and their schedule of training.

sections.heading: All carriers affected by this Act shall initiate the training program
sections.text: within 1 year of the effective date of this Act in the following manner:
